item.title: How to make a virtual rally
Hub structure
item.description: Teams Actions team The actions team devises strategy and tactics to support the overall objectives of the hub. We are in the process of determining new, longer- and shorter-term goals, for which we would love to have your unique creative input! Arts/Media/Comms Media gets the word out there to anyone looking for our hub on the internet or via the press and updates the public on what we are doing (preferably in an engaging way!
